abstract: White Collar Watch examines the issues and problems that the Securities and Exchange Commission faces in its case against the billionaire Wyly brothers, who are accused of securities fraud and insider trading.
snippet: White Collar Watch examines the issues and problems that the Securities and Exchange Commission faces in its case against the billionaire Wyly brothers, who are accused of securities fraud and insider trading.
lead_paragraph: Peter J. Henning follows issues involving securities law and white-collar crime for DealBook’s White Collar Watch.

headline.main: A Tangled Web for the Wyly Brothers
